org.xmlsoft

Class LibXmlException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.xmlsoft.LibXmlException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class LibXmlException
extends RuntimeException

    Encapsulate an XML parse error or warning.

    This exception may include information for locating the error in the original XML document, as if it came from a Locator object.

    Author:
    Jang-Ho Hwang, rath@xrath.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
